title: Woman cheats death after being knocked onto train tracks by commuter who fainted

A woman cheated death after being knocked in front of a tube train by a commuter who fainted.

The woman was left unconscious on the tracks as the train hurtled towards her into the station during the freak accident in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

A video of the dramatic incident shows other commuters frantically waving their arms to try to get the tube to brake in time.

Luckily the train managed to stop before reaching the woman, grinding to a halt just inches from where she was lying motionless.

CCTV footage showed a man at the back of the platform losing his balance.

(Image: Buenos Aires Metropolitan Police)

(Image: Buenos Aires Metropolitan Police)

He appears to faint and smashes into the female commuter crossing in front of him as he falls.

Others then step in to try and alert the train driver while the man who fainted staggers to his feet.

Good Samaritans then step onto the track and help the woman to safety after the train stops.

(Image: Buenos Aires Metropolitan Police)

(Image: Buenos Aires Metropolitan Police)

The drama occurred at around 11am local time on Tuesday morning at Pueyrredon Metro Station.

The woman was subsequently seen being assisted by police and medical responders.

It was not immediately clear this morning if she had been taken to hospital and how bad her injuries were, but local media said she had cheated death in what they described as a “miracle.”
